name: HackShot
description:
Made for mini jam 15 -technology-

Made in free version of construct 2

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

INSTRUCTIONS

CONTROLS:

WASD or ZQSD (for azerty keyboards) to move

Right click to aim and left click to shoot (while aiming)

if nearby a computer, right click to hack

OBJECTIVE:

search and hack all the 5 computers hidden around the game, but be careful to don't get caught by the sentinels!

after hacking all the 5 computers you can escape if you found the exit door

NOTE: you can shoot on a sentinel to stun it for a while

NOTE 2: shooting a yellow block will destroy it

NOTE 3: if you get caught, you will need to re-hack all the computers

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

yep, the game don't have sounds

hope you enjoy :D
